public method Parser::Context::Parens::addToken (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in addToken: 8
sub addToken {
  my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
  my $data = $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}}{$token};
  unless ($data->{hidden}) {
    $self->{tokens}{$token} = "open";
    $self->{tokens}{$data->{close}} = "close" unless $data->{close} eq $token;
  }
}

# Number of lines of code in clear: 5
sub clear {
  my $self = shift;
  $self->SUPER::clear();
  $self->redefine('start');
}
public method Parser::Context::Parens::init (  ) 

Undocumented Method

# Number of lines of code in init: 7
sub init {
  my $self = shift;
  $self->{dataName} = 'parens';
  $self->{name} = 'parenthesis';
  $self->{Name} = 'Parenthesis';
  $self->{namePattern} = qr/\S+/;
}
public method Parser::Context::Parens::removeToken (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in removeToken: 6
sub removeToken {
  my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
  my $data = $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}}{$token};
  delete $self->{tokens}{$token};
  delete $self->{tokens}{$data->{close}} unless $data->{hidden} || $data->{close} eq $token;
}
